lead_paragraph: U.S. soldier Ray Elwood (Joaquin Phoenix) has nothing to fight but boredom as the Cold War winds down, so he begins trading anything he can get his hands on in West Germany's booming black-market.
snippet: U.S. soldier Ray Elwood (Joaquin Phoenix) has nothing to fight but boredom as the Cold War winds down, so he begins trading anything he can get his hands on in West Germany's booming black-market.
